item.title: Spiel des Jahres 2022 predictions
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: TODO Candidates for Spiel des Jahres 2022 #1: Lost Cities: Roll & Write 2â€“5 players, 30 minutes, 8+ years, light (1.1), 97% Spiel This is an interesting one: While the jury completely ignored the original Lost Cities (now considered a classic), it did pin the main award on Keltis (essentially the board game version). Will they come back to the same system for the Roll & Write version? #2: So Clover!
